summer_holiday_tours.title: Summer Holiday Tours
summer_holiday_tours.subtitle: Escape the heat with refreshing getaways to stunning hill stations and coastal paradises
summer_holiday_tours.description: Beat the summer heat with our specially curated summer holiday packages. Explore India's most breathtaking hill stations, pristine beaches, and lush valleys offering cool retreats, adventure activities, and unforgettable experiences for families, couples, and solo travelers alike.
inclusions: Accommodation in handpicked hotels and resorts
Private air-conditioned vehicle with experienced driver

itinerary.title: Arrival at Destination
itinerary.description: Arrive at your chosen summer retreat. Check into your hotel and spend the evening at leisure, perhaps exploring the surroundings or enjoying a welcome dinner featuring local specialties.

itinerary.title: Local Exploration
itinerary.description: Full day exploring major attractions of your destination. Visit viewpoints, local markets, and historical sites. Experience the unique culture and natural beauty of the region.

itinerary.title: Adventure Day
itinerary.description: Engage in adventure activities suitable to your destination - trekking, paragliding, river rafting, or snorkeling depending on location. Afternoon at leisure to relax and rejuvenate.

itinerary.title: Nature Excursion
itinerary.description: Visit nearby natural attractions - waterfalls, lakes, valleys, or beaches. Picnic lunch amidst nature. Evening cultural experience with local music and dance.

itinerary.title: Local Culture
itinerary.description: Immerse in local culture with visits to traditional villages, craft centers, or monasteries. Try local cuisine cooking class and shop for authentic souvenirs and handicrafts.

itinerary.title: Leisure Day
itinerary.description: Free day to relax or explore on your own. Optional activities like spa treatments, meditation sessions, or additional excursions available on request.

itinerary.title: Departure
itinerary.description: After breakfast, check-out and transfer to airport/railway station for your onward journey, carrying memories of a refreshing summer holiday.

highlights: Escape the scorching summer heat in naturally cool environments
Stay in carefully selected accommodations offering stunning views
Experience thrilling adventure activities suitable for all age groups
Explore pristine natural landscapes away from urban congestion
Indulge in seasonal delicacies and fresh local produce
Connect with diverse cultural traditions across beautiful destinations
Create lasting memories with customized experiences for families and couples

accommodations.name: Mountain View Resort
accommodations.description: Luxurious property nestled in the mountains offering panoramic views, modern amenities, spa facilities, and multi-cuisine restaurants featuring local ingredients.

accommodations.name: Beachside Retreat
accommodations.description: Contemporary resort with direct beach access, infinity pools, water sports facilities, and open-air dining options featuring fresh seafood.

accommodations.name: Valley Eco Lodge
accommodations.description: Sustainable accommodation in the heart of nature with cottage-style rooms, organic farm-to-table dining, and eco-friendly practices.

accommodations.name: Heritage Hill Station Hotel
accommodations.description: Colonial-era building restored with modern comforts while maintaining historic charm, featuring gardens, fireplaces, and classic high-tea service.

destinations.name: Himalayan Highlands Escape
destinations.description: Discover the majestic beauty of the Himalayas with our specially curated summer package covering Shimla, Manali, and Dharamshala. Enjoy cool mountain air, pine forests, adventure activities, and the unique cultural heritage of these renowned hill stations.

activities: Arrival in Shimla and hotel check-in
Evening stroll on the historic Mall Road
Visit Christ Church and Scandal Point
Visit Kufri for mountain views and activities
Tour of Viceregal Lodge and Botanical Gardens
Shopping at Lakkar Bazaar for wooden crafts
Visit Solang Valley for adventure activities
Tour of Hadimba Temple and Manu Temple
Explore Old Manali markets and cafes
Learn about Tibetan culture and cuisine

destinations.name: Coastal Paradise Getaway
destinations.description: Experience the best of India's coastline with our exclusive beach holiday package. Explore the golden beaches of Goa, experience water sports, indulge in fresh seafood cuisine, and enjoy the laid-back coastal lifestyle at premium beachfront accommodations.

activities: Arrival in Goa and resort check-in
Beachside welcome dinner with live music
Morning yoga session on the beach
Visit to spice plantation with Goan lunch
Heritage tour of Old Goa churches
Visit Fort Aguada and surrounding beaches
Day trip to less-explored South Goa beaches
Visit Butterfly Beach and Cola Beach
Evening Goan carnival-style dinner and dance
Visit to local markets for souvenirs

destinations.name: Tea Gardens and Valleys
destinations.description: Immerse yourself in the lush green landscapes of South India's most beautiful hill stations. This package covers Munnar, Ooty, and Coonoor, offering breathtaking views of tea plantations, misty valleys, colonial heritage, and refreshing mountain air perfect for summer rejuvenation.

activities: Arrival in Munnar and resort check-in
Tea factory tour and tasting session
Morning visit to Mattupetty Dam and Echo Point
Nilgiri Mountain Railway toy train experience
Visit Sim's Park and Dolphin's Nose viewpoint
Tea estate walk with expert guide
High tea experience at heritage property
Visit Lamb's Rock and Catherine Falls
Jungle safari at Mudumalai Wildlife Sanctuary

destinations.name: Island Paradise Experience
destinations.description: Escape to the pristine Andaman Islands for the ultimate summer holiday. Discover crystal-clear waters, coral reefs, white sandy beaches, and lush tropical forests. This package offers the perfect balance of relaxation, water activities, and nature exploration.

activities: Arrival in Port Blair and hotel check-in
Visit Cellular Jail and attend Light & Sound show
Glass-bottom boat ride over coral reefs
Evening at leisure with beachside dinner
Morning cycling tour of Neil Island
Visit Ross Island and North Bay
Shopping for pearl and shell crafts
Visit Chatham Saw Mill and Forest Museum
